name: Peritus Capital
overview: Peritus Capital has completed a wide variety of mergers and acquisitions on behalf of companies of all sizes and in many industries, always working directly with the owners, entrepreneurs, managers, officers and Boards of Directors of its clients. They specialize in representing and advising the owners and operators of privately held and micro-cap or small-cap publicly traded companies who wish to consider the possibility of a sale. Their sales clients generally have annual revenues between $5 and $45 million, operating across a broad range of industries. They regularly represent businesses built and run by individuals, partnerships and families. Their financing clients are generally early-stage (inclusive of seed or start-up companies) private companies operating in high-growth potential industries, with established operations, proprietary and defensible business plans, and existing customers.
